name: Spirit of Revenge: Cursed Castle HD - A Hidden Object Mystery Game
name_original: Spirit of Revenge: Cursed Castle HD - A Hidden Object Mystery Game
description:
Play the trial for FREE! Pay once & complete the adventure!

You are called to investigate yet another disappearance at a famous castle, of its new owner and his son. Only Lord Flatsbury’s young daughter Jessie saw what happened. Can you win the girl’s trust and solve the mystery that spooked her into silence?

• WHAT HAPPENED AT FLATSBURY CASTLE?
Take on the role of Ms. Gale, a famous detective, who just happens to pass by when the police rescue a little girl from the ominous castle.

• INVESTIGATE THE DISAPPEARANCES
Put together clues, talk to ghosts, and learn about the castle’s history to figure out just what happened in this strange case.

• UNCOVER THE SECRETS OF A GOTHIC CASTLE
Your detective skills will be put to the test with challenging hidden object puzzles and mini-games! Explore the rest of the castle for clues to the strange disappearances!

• ACCESS EXCLUSIVE EXTRAS IN THE BONUS CHAPTER!
This collector’s edition includes beautifully drawn concept art and wallpapers, replayable mini-games, and access to an art gallery that reveals more of the Flatsbury family secrets.
